slides.text:
Brief Description
Bu shunchaki namuna tarzida bo‘lib, uni o‘z startap loyihangizga moslab,
individual o‘zgartirishlar va ko‘rsatkichlar qo'shishingiz mumkin.

Parental Control
Problem and solution
Problem
School Students getting addicted to phone usage
Solution
Mahsulot bu muammoni qanday hal qilishini ko‘rsating.

Narrow Market Analysis
1
10K SOM
2
300K SAM
3
2M TAM
Bozor: maqsadli auditoriya diagrammasi.

Primary users
Our primary users are parents of primary school children seeking to guide safe and balanced digital habits for their kids.
Mijoz Segmentlari
Tech-aware families who want to encourage healthy device use.

Schools promoting digital responsibility programs and offering your app as part of parent–teacher collaboration.
Qo'shimcha Segmentlar
Agencies focusing on child safety, digital literacy, or education reform initiatives.

Local internet providers or device retailers who can bundle the app as a value-added service.
